getting_to_know.en: What is your best childhood memory?
getting_to_know.zh: 你最美好的童年记忆是什么？

getting_to_know.en: Who was your spiritual role model growing up?
getting_to_know.zh: 在成长过程中，谁是你属灵的榜样？

getting_to_know.en: What Bible story captivated you as a child?
getting_to_know.zh: 小时候哪个圣经故事最吸引你？

getting_to_know.en: When did you first feel God's presence in your life?
getting_to_know.zh: 你第一次感受到神的同在是什么时候？

getting_to_know.en: What childhood experience taught you about God's love?
getting_to_know.zh: 哪个童年经历让你认识到神的爱？

ideals_reals.en: How does your faith influence your work ethic?
ideals_reals.zh: 你的信仰如何影响你的工作态度？

ideals_reals.en: What biblical principle guides your career decisions?
ideals_reals.zh: 什么圣经原则指导你的职业决定？

ideals_reals.en: How do you share your faith in your workplace?
ideals_reals.zh: 你如何在工作场所分享你的信仰？

ideals_reals.en: What professional challenge taught you to depend on God?
ideals_reals.zh: 哪个职业挑战教会你依靠神？

ideals_reals.en: How do you balance ambition with humility?
ideals_reals.zh: 你如何平衡雄心与谦卑？

heart_to_heart.en: When did your faith become your own, not just inherited?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你的信仰何时成为你自己的，而不仅是继承的？

heart_to_heart.en: What doubt has strengthened your faith?
heart_to_heart.zh: 什么疑惑反而加强了你的信仰？

heart_to_heart.en: How would you describe God in one word and why?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你会用一个词来描述神，是什么？为什么？

heart_to_heart.en: What Bible verse has changed your life?
heart_to_heart.zh: 哪节圣经经文改变了你的生命？

heart_to_heart.en: What miracle have you witnessed or experienced?
heart_to_heart.zh: 你见证或经历过什么神迹？

memories.en: What is the most memorable memory that has shaped who you are?
memories.zh: 哪个记忆最深刻地塑造了现在的你？

memories.en: Who showed you Christ's love through their actions?
memories.zh: 谁通过他们的行为向你展示了基督的爱？

memories.en: What childhood moment made you grateful to God?
memories.zh: 哪个童年时刻让你对神充满感恩？

memories.en: What did worship look like in your childhood home?
memories.zh: 在你童年的家中，敬拜是什么样子的？

memories.en: What childhood experience challenged your understanding of God?
memories.zh: 哪个童年经历挑战了你对神的理解？

matters_of_soul.en: When you feel down, how do you want brothers and sisters to help you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 当你感到沮丧时，你希望弟兄姐妹如何帮助你？

matters_of_soul.en: Who in your church family has impacted you most and how?
matters_of_soul.zh: 教会中的谁对你影响最大？怎样影响的？

matters_of_soul.en: How do you practice Christ-like love in difficult relationships?
matters_of_soul.zh: 在困难的关系中，你如何实践基督般的爱？

matters_of_soul.en: What does true Christian friendship mean to you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 真正的基督徒友谊对你意味着什么？

matters_of_soul.en: How has God used community to heal you?
matters_of_soul.zh: 神如何使用团契来医治你？
